Once the mind is clear, restful feelings and focused thoughts

- [6 Incredible Shrines You Need to See](https://rashiddeveloper1.github.io/dosomething/6-incredible-shrines/) - Shrines are found in most religions around the world. - [5 World Heritage Sites You Have to Visit](https://rashiddeveloper1.github.io/dosomething/5-world-heritage-sites/) - So what exactly is a World Heritage Site? It is a site the United Nations says is of outstanding universal value.
